attributes.additional_details:
The holding of government to ransom and preventing them from delivering the will of the people has to illegal! Therefore the only way to determine who stays and who goes should be given to the electorate! 

Remainers have done nothing but stand in the way of the 17.4 million voters of leave and we now demand the right to a General election! They are all going to fall sooner or later...fact!!!!
attributes.background: Parliament and the Supreme Court have proven their wish to frustrate the will of the people! 17.4 million People voted to leave the EU and our democratically elected prime minister and government have been prevented from delivering the wishes of the majority so, the majority demand an election!
